bands.name: SAA

bands.name: Flags_LP

bands.name: Flags_Platform

bands.description: Plasma Bubble Index (0 Quiet; 1 Bubble; -1 Not analyzed)
bands.name: Bubble_Index

bands.description: Detection probability of the plasma bubble (in steps of 0.2; 0-not probable, 1-very probable)
bands.name: Bubble_Probability

bands.description: Flags related to the plasma bubble index
bands.name: Flags_Bubble

bands.description: Geographic longitude of satellite crossing of the magnetic equator
bands.name: longitude

bands.description: Geographic latitude of satellite crossing of the magnetic equator
bands.name: latitude

bands.description: Estimate of the equatorial electric field
bands.name: EEF

bands.description: Quality indicator of EEF estimate; relative error between modeled and observed current profil
bands.name: RelErr

bands.description: Flags describing data gaps and satellite identification
bands.name: flags

bands.description: Flags characterizing the product quality (processing flags)
bands.name: Flags

bands.description: Flags_F passed through from L1b and accumulated for quad points
bands.name: Flags_F

bands.description: Flags_B passed through from L1b and accumulated for quad points
bands.name: Flags_B

bands.description: Flags_q passed through from L1b and accumulated for quad point
bands.name: Flags_q

bands.description: GPS signal-to-noise ratio or raw signal strength on L1
bands.name: S1

bands.description: GPS signal-to-noise ratio or raw signal strength on L2
bands.name: S2

bands.description: Root mean square error of relative slant TEC
bands.name: Relative_STEC_RMS

bands.description: Error of the GPS receiver differential code bias
bands.name: DCB_Error

bands.description: F10.7 - Daily 10.7 cm solar radio flux, units: 10**(-22) Joules/second/square-meter/Hertz, from NGDC (1963/001-2016/366)
bands.name: F10_INDEX

bands.description: Plasma density, directly copied from the Langmuir probe files.
bands.name: Ne

bands.description: Background density, as calculated from Ne using a percentile filter of 551 datapoints (2 Hz raw data) and 35 as the percentile.
bands.name: Background_Ne

bands.description: Foreground density, as calculated from ndens using a percentile filter of 7 datapoints (2 Hz raw data) and 50 as the percentile.
bands.name: Foreground_Ne

bands.description: Electron temperature, directly copied from the Langmuir probe files.
bands.name: Te

bands.description: The polar cap patch flag:  0 if the plasma density measurement occurred OUTSIDE a polar cap patch. 1 if the plasma density measurement occurred at one of the edges of a polar cap patch (no plasma velocity measurements are available). 2 if the plasma density measurement occurred at the LEADING edge of a polar cap patch. 3 if the plasma density measurement occurred at the TRAILING edge of a polar cap patch. 4 if the plasma density measurement occurred INSIDE a polar cap patch proper. When no ion drift data is available, the leading and trailing edges cannot be distinguished. In this case the polar cap patch flag is set to 4 throughout the patch proper and to 1 throughout both edges.
bands.name: PCP_flag

bands.description: The electron density gradient in a running window calculated via linear regression over 27 data points for the 2 Hz electron density data.
bands.name: Grad_Ne_at_100km

bands.description: The electron density gradient in a running window calculated via linear regression over 13 data points for the 2 Hz electron density data.
bands.name: Grad_Ne_at_50km

bands.description: The electron density gradient in a running window calculated via linear regression over 5 data points for the 2 Hz electron density data.
bands.name: Grad_Ne_at_20km

bands.description: The linear electron density gradient calculated over the edges of a patch. This variable is non-zero only at the edges of polar cap patches.
bands.name: Grad_Ne_at_PCP_edge

bands.description: Rate Of change of Density Index (RODI) is the standard deviation of ROD over 10 seconds.
bands.name: RODI10s

bands.description: Rate Of change of Density Index (RODI) is the standard deviation of ROD over 20 seconds.
bands.name: RODI20s

bands.description: Derived by subtracting Ne by its median filtered value in 10 seconds. As a result, delta_Ne10s indicates the electron density fluctuations smaller than 75 km.
bands.name: delta_Ne10s

bands.description: Derived by subtracting Ne by its median filtered value in 20 seconds. As a result, delta_Ne20s indicates the electron density fluctuations smaller than 150 km.
bands.name: delta_Ne20s

bands.description: Derived by subtracting Ne by its median filtered value in 40 seconds. As a result, delta_Ne40s indicates the electron density fluctuations smaller than 300 km.
bands.name: delta_Ne40s

bands.description: Total number of tracked GPS satellites above 20 degrees.
bands.name: Num_GPS_satellites

bands.description: Median of VTEC from all available GPS satellites above 30 degrees.
bands.name: mVTEC

bands.description: Median of Rate Of change of TEC (ROT) from all available GPS satellites above 30 degrees.
bands.name: mROT

bands.description: Median of Rate Of change of TEC Index (ROTI) from all available GPS satellites above 30 degrees. The ROTI of each satellite is the standard deviation of ROT over 10 seconds.
bands.name: mROTI10s

bands.description: Median of Rate Of change of TEC Index (ROTI) from all available GPS satellites above 30 degrees. The ROTI of each satellite is the standard deviation of ROT over 20 seconds.
bands.name: mROTI20s

bands.description: Plasma Bubble Index, copied from the level-2 Ionospheric Bubble Index product, IBIxTMS_2F.
bands.name: IBI_flag

bands.description: 0: equator, 1: mid-latitudes; 2: auroral oval; 3: polar cap.
bands.name: Ionopshere_region_flag

bands.description: The numeric index for plasma fluctuations and irregularities: 0-3 low, 4-5 medium, and > 6 high level of ionospheric plasma irregularities.
bands.name: IPIR_index

bands.description: Quality flag for the Ne data and the derived data from Ne, e.g., background density, foreground density etc.
bands.name: Ne_quality_flag

bands.description: STD of VTEC from all GPS satellites.
bands.name: TEC_STD
